com.esotericsoftware.kryo.util

Class UnsafeUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.esotericsoftware.kryo.util.UnsafeUtil

  • public class UnsafeUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A few utility methods for using @link{java.misc.Unsafe}, mostly for private use. Use of Unsafe on Android is forbidden, as Android provides only a very limited functionality for this class compared to the JDK version.
    Author:
    Roman Levenstein

      • getDirectBufferAt

        public static final java.nio.ByteBuffer getDirectBufferAt(long address,
                                    int maxBufferSize)
        Create a ByteBuffer that uses a provided (off-heap) memory region instead of allocating a new one.
        Parameters:
        address - address of the memory region to be used for a ByteBuffer
        maxBufferSize - size of the memory region
        Returns:
        a new ByteBuffer that uses a provided memory region instead of allocating a new one

      • releaseBuffer

        public static void releaseBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer niobuffer)
        Release a direct buffer. NOTE: If Cleaner is not accessible due to SecurityManager restrictions, reflection could be used to obtain the "clean" method and then invoke it.
